channel.description: I cant get in the server when i type the IP and i cant find the IP of the server i download!!!

item.title: How do i get in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Arsenal Arsenal
item.description:
@Arsenal wrote:

Go to the [b]Triangle[/b] in the bottom right, click [b]Join an existing network[/b], copy + paste the Hamachi name the server topic gives you, then type in the pass for it.

Read full topic

item.source: How do i get in a server?

item.title: How do i get in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Arsenal Arsenal
item.description:
@Arsenal wrote:

I do not think you “download” servers, go into the Rs2 Server Advertisement Section and get to a server, go up to ‘File’ in the moparscape client, click ‘Server Ip’ copy + paste the ip, click ok, then go to ‘Server Port’ and type in the port.

You may need Hamachi, www.hamich.cc/download. Then it will give you step by step instructions.

Glad I could help you, if you need me just give me a pm!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get in a server?
